summary: The website demonstrates mixed performance characteristics. While most pages load within acceptable thresholds, there are some concerning areas, particularly around form interactions. The average TTFB of 250ms is acceptable, but the FCP averaging 966ms indicates room for improvement.

issues.message: Login form response time exceeds threshold
issues.recommendation: Optimize server-side processing for login requests and implement client-side form validation to reduce server load

issues.message: First Contentful Paint (FCP) above recommended threshold
issues.recommendation: Implement lazy loading for non-critical resources and optimize critical rendering path

issues.message: Time to First Byte (TTFB) shows room for improvement
issues.recommendation: Consider implementing server-side caching and optimizing database queries

insights: Homepage performance is consistently good with fast load times
Form interactions show higher latency compared to static page loads
Search functionality maintains good performance despite complexity
Consider implementing performance budgets to prevent regression
Mobile performance metrics should be monitored separately
